mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.type AS "type", a.parentid AS "parentid", a.sum AS "sum", a.testtype AS "testtype", a.fraction AS "fraction", a.testtime AS "testtime", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ztest( id, title, type, parentid, sum, testtype, fraction, testtime, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{type}, #{parentid}, #{sum}, #{testtype}, #{fraction}, #{testtime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ztest SET title = #{title}, type = #{type}, parentid = #{parentid}, sum = #{sum}, testtype = #{testtype}, fraction = #{fraction}, testtime = #{testtime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
